stepDescription.cn: 育苗阶段：照料田块，让植物种子开始发芽。
stepDescription.en: Germination: Tend the plot to help the seeds germinate.

stepDescription.cn: 浇水阶段：给植物提供生长所必须的水分
stepDescription.en: Watering: Give the crops water they need for growth.

stepDescription.cn: 生长阶段：静待一段时间使植物充分成长，该阶段可进行1次施肥
stepDescription.en: Growing: Wait a while for the crops to mature. This phase allows 1 round of fertilization.

stepDescription.cn: 收获阶段：收获成熟的植物，获得丰收的喜悦
stepDescription.en: Harvest: The mature crops are ready. Enjoy the fruits of your labor.
